channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Using OpenAI’s Audio-Preview Model with Semantic Kernel】使用OpenAI的音频浏览模型与语义内核
item.description: 【OpenAI’s gpt-4o-audio-preview is a powerful multimodal model that enables audio input and output capabilities, allowing developers to create more natural and accessible AI interactions. This model supports both speech-to-text and text-to-speech functionalities in a single API call through the Chat Completions API, making it suitable for building voice-enabled applications where turn-based interactions are appropriate. In this […]】OpenAI的GPT-4O-Audio-Preview是一个强大的多模式模型，可实现音频输入和输出功能，使开发人员能够创建更自然且易于访问的AI交互。该模型通过聊天完成API支持单个API呼叫中的语音到文本和文本到语音功能，使其适用于构建基于转弯的交互的语音应用程序。在这个[…]

item.title: 【Your Pluralsight Benefit Just Got Better】您的多元化福利变得更好
item.description: 【  As I talk with Visual Studio developers about the learning and skilling benefits included in their subscription, one thing I hear often is: “I wish I had more time to actually use Pluralsight.” Starting today, I’m pleased to share that we’re doing something about that. We’ve extended access to Pluralsight for all Visual Studio […]】 当我与Visual Studio开发人员谈论他们订阅中所包含的学习和技能好处时，我经常听到的一件事是：“我希望我有更多的时间实际使用PluralSight。”从今天开始，我很高兴分享我们正在为此做些事情。我们扩展了所有Visual Studio的PluralSight访问权限[…]

item.title: 【Dev Proxy v0.26 with improved mocking, plugin validation, and Docker support】开发代理v0.26具有改进的模拟，插件验证和Docker支持
item.description: 【The latest version of Dev Proxy brings improved validation, plugin reliability, a brand-new Docker image and more.】Dev Proxy的最新版本带来了改进的验证，插件可靠性，全新的Docker图像等。

item.title: 【Automatically generate any doc comment for C++ functions in Visual Studio】自动在Visual Studio中为C ++功能生成任何DOC评论
item.description: 【Have a difficult time documenting your C++ code? Spending too much time thinking of what a function and its parameters accomplish when generating documentation? Copilot is now integrated into C++ doc comments to automatically provide documentation suggestions based on the function’s contents in Visual Studio 2022 17.14 Preview 2. To learn more about this feature, […]】很难记录您的C ++代码吗？花费太多时间来思考生成文档时的功能及其参数完成的工作？现在将Copilot集成到C ++文档注释中，以根据Visual Studio 2022 17.14 Preview 2中的功能内容自动提供文档建议。要了解有关此功能的更多信息，[…]

item.title: 【Adding delays to our task sequencer, part 2】将延迟添加到我们的任务序列器，第2部分
item.description: 【Waiting the right amount of time.】等待适当的时间。

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Data access management】Microsoft 365认证控制聚光灯：数据访问管理
item.description: 【Read how Microsoft 365 Certification ensures data access management best practices for Microsoft 365 apps, add-ins, and Copilot agents.】阅读Microsoft 365认证如何确保数据访问管理Microsoft 365应用程序，加载项和副代理的最佳实践。

item.title: 【CDN Domain URL change for Agents in Pipelines】CDN域URL在管道中的代理变化
item.description: 【Introduction We have announced the retirement of Edgio CDN for Azure DevOps and are transitioning to a solution served by Akamai and Azure Front Door CDNs. This change affects Azure DevOps Pipelines customers. This article provides guidance for the Azure DevOps Pipelines customers to check if they are impacted by this change in CDN and […]】简介我们已经宣布将Edgio CDN退休，用于Azure Devops，并已过渡到Akamai和Azure前门CDN提供的解决方案。这种变化会影响Azure Devops管道客户。本文为Azure Devops Pipelines客户提供了指导，以检查他们是否受到CDN和[…]的变化影响。

item.title: 【Code the Future with Java and AI – Join Me at JDConf 2025】用Java和AI代码 - 加入我的JDConf 2025
item.description: 【Wednesday, April 9, 2025 – 8:30 AM PDT 👉 RSVP now: jdconf.com JDConf 2025 is just around the corner, and whether you’re a Java developer, architect, team leader, or decision maker I hope you’ll join me as we explore how Java is evolving with the power of AI and how you can start building the […]】2025年4月9日，星期三，pdt pdt👉rsvp现在：jdconf.com JDCONF 2025即将临近，无论您是Java开发人员，建筑师，团队负责人还是决策者，我希望您能在我们探索Java如何随着AI的能力以及您如何构建AI构建的能力时​​加入我的行列，

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) – April 2025】Azure开发人员CLI（AZD） - 2025年4月
item.description: 【This post announces the April release of the Azure Developer CLI (`azd`).】这篇文章宣布了Azure开发商CLI（AZD'）的四月发布。

item.title: 【Hola, Spain Central! Microsoft Dev Box Expands in Europe】霍拉，西班牙中央！ Microsoft Dev Box在欧洲扩展
item.description: 【You asked, we built it. We’re thrilled to announce that Spain Central is now a supported region for Microsoft Dev Box! 🎉 That’s right — starting today, you can spin up Dev Boxes in Spain Central and get all the benefits of fast, secure, ready-to-code workstations, now closer to your European teams and data. To […]】您问，我们建造了它。我们很高兴地宣布，西班牙中央现在是Microsoft Dev Box的支持区域！ 🎉没错 - 从今天开始，您可以在西班牙中心旋转开发箱，并获得快速，安全，即时准备的工作站的所有好处，现在更靠近您的欧洲团队和数据。到 […]
